授業目的: The course aims to train students in critical reading and thinking as well as academic writing.
到達目標: Students will learn to read and think critically as well as writing academic essays.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

第1回: Classes will be conducted face-to-face from the 1st week. For class content, please see below.
第3回: Library Orientation in lieu of regular class.
トピック.授業計画1: We will discuss (including presentations) Michael Booth's "Three Tigers, One Mountain." (Penguin, 2020) in the course.
トピック.授業外学習2: 3 hours of reading and writing of a 250 word essay every week.
